name: Offstream
headline: Vanta for carbon compliance
description:
Offstream is Vanta for carbon compliance. 

Today, every new infrastructure project, from data centers to biomass power plants has a complicated mess of local, state, federal, and private sector standards that they must understand and comply with to make their projects profitable.

Offstream solves this by using LLMs to parse regulations, generate technical reports for customers, and manage 100,000+ operational data points on project’s lifecycles. We cut the time customers spend on compliance by 90% and at 1/5th of the cost of alternatives.

founders.name: Varsha Ramesh Walsh, Founder
founders.description:
CEO and co-founder at Offstream. HBS '23. 

Previously a strategy lead at Indigo Ag where I launched a traceable cotton business and got the business to $50M GMV bookings in a year. At Indigo, I experienced the pain point we are now solving at Offstream. We hired 80 people and spent $50M to just get carbon compliant.

founders.name: Zach Janicki, Founder
founders.description: CTO and cofounder of Offstream. CS from Notre Dame. Previously 1st engineering hire at Repool (YC S21) building hedge fund software, and early engineer at Pathpoint building insurance brokerage software. I've spent my career turning paperwork into software

generated_description:
Offstream is a freshly minted startup founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24. Their mission is as ambitious as it is necessary: to streamline the complex regulatory landscape surrounding carbon compliance for new infrastructure projects. Whether it’s a gleaming new data center or a biomass power plant, these projects face an intricate web of local, state, federal, and private sector regulations. Offstream’s solution? They leverage large language models (LLMs) to untangle these regulations, generate meaningful technical reports, and manage over 100,000 operational data points across project lifecycles. 

This innovation allows customers to cut compliance time by a staggering 90% while slashing the costs to just one-fifth of traditional methods. In a world where carbon compliance can make or break a project's profitability, Offstream positions itself as an essential partner for companies looking to navigate these waters confidently.

The team is currently comprised of just five dedicated employees, showcasing a lean startup ethos that prioritizes agility and expertise. They're based in an undisclosed location, indicating they may be ready to adapt and move in alignment with their clients’ needs. Diana Hu serves as their Group Partner, further grounding the company in a network of expert advice and mentorship.

Offstream offers an all-in-one solution that guides users through different stages of their carbon projects—launching, growing, and scaling—ensuring that they meet all third-party certification and compliance requirements. If you’re in the business of developing carbon projects, it’s hard to overstate the value of having a clear, efficient path through the tangle of regulations and standards.

For those interested in getting compliant or simply looking to optimize their operations in the burgeoning carbon market, Offstream is your one-stop shop. You can explore further at [useoffstream.com](https://www.useoffstream.com/).
